body.gathalast: Sabbāsavā ca no natthi, ārocema mahāmune.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Purimaṃ kusalaṃ kammaṃparikammañca kusalaṃ , yaṃ kiñci sādhupatthitaṃ;
‘‘Uppatte ca kate kamme, jātiyā vāpi ekato;
‘‘Svāgataṃ vata no āsi, mama buddhassa santike;
body.gathalast: Tisso vijjā anuppattā, kataṃ buddhassa sāsanaṃ.
body.paragraph: Itthaṃ sudaṃ yasavatīpamukhāni khattiyakaññābhikkhuniyo aṭṭhārasasahassāni bhagavato sammukhā imā gāthāyo abhāsitthāti.
body.gathalast: Cātuddīpā bahū kaññā, pure tuyhaṃ mahāmune.
Devā ca kinnarā nāgā, phusissanti anāgate.
Tumhaṃ tvayi (sī. pī.) pasādaṃ paṭiladdhā, bujjhissanti anāgate.
Pekkhato no lakkhaṇā ca (syā.) mahāvīra, pāde vandāma cakkhuma.
Catunnaṃ saṃsayaṃ chetvā, sabbā gacchantu nibbutiṃ.
Dassayiṃsu balaṃ sabbā, pāde vandiṃsu satthuno.
Ñāṇaṃ amhaṃ mahāvīra, uppannaṃ tava santike.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Yaṃ amhehi kataṃ kammaṃ, kusalaṃ sara taṃ mune;
body.gathalast: Ubbaḷhā nadiyā bhikkhū, gamanaṃ na labhanti te.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Divasaṃ dve tayo ceva, sattāhaṃ māsikaṃ tato;
body.gathalast: Catumāsampi sampuṇṇaṃ, gamanaṃ na labhanti te.
Oruddhe oratīre (syā.) bhikkhavo disvā, setuṃ gaṅgāya kārayi.
Tassa setuṃ tesu setuvihāresuvihārañcatassa setū vihāre ca , samabhāgaṃ akaṃsu te.
Tassa dhammesu dāyādā, nagare janapadesu ca.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Itthī pumā kumārā ca, bahū ceva kumārikā;
body.gathalast: Setuno ca vihārassa, vālukā ākiriṃsu te.
Dhūpaṃ cuṇṇañca mālañca, kāraṃ katvāna satthuno.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Rūpabhogayase ceva, atho kittiñca sakkataṃ kittisukhaṃ piyaṃ (syā.);
body.gathalast: Cikkhallabhūmimasuciṃcikkhallaṃ bhūmiṃ gamanaṃ , na passāma mahāmune.
Upanenti sadā sabbaṃ, pubbakammaphalena nopubbakammaphalaṃ tatopubbakammaphalaṃ tato .
Saṃsārapathanitthiṇṇā, vītarāgā bhavāmase natthi dāni punabbhavo (sī. syā. pī.).
Upanenti sadā amhe, sahassāni tato tato.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Svāgataṃ vata no āsi…pe… kataṃ buddhassa sāsanaṃ.
body.paragraph: Itthaṃ sudaṃ caturāsītibrāhmaṇakaññābhikkhunīsahassāni bhagavato sammukhā imā gāthāyo abhāsitthāti.
body.gathalast: Tassa rañño ahuṃ bhariyā, ekajjhaṃ cārayāmahaṃ.
‘Kusalaṃ me kataṃ natthi, ādāya gamiyaṃ mama.
Nirayaṃ nūna gacchāmi, ettha me natthi saṃsayo’.
body.gatha1: ‘‘‘Itthī nāma mayaṃ deva, purisānugatā sadāpurisānittarā ahupurisā na bhavāma nopurisānaṃ bharā mayaṃ ;
body.gathalast: Ekaṃ me samaṇaṃ dehi, bhojayissāmi khattiya’.
Nānāvidhaṃ bahuṃ aññaṃ, tassa kammaphalaṃ tato.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Yaṃ mayhaṃ pūritaṃ kammaṃ, kusalaṃ sarase muni;
body.gathalast: Aññaṃ gatiṃ na jānāmi, piṇḍapātassidaṃ phalaṃ.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Ucce kule pajāyāmi, mahāsāle tayo sāla (ka.) mahaddhane;
body.gathalast: Aññe kule na jāyāmi, piṇḍapātassidaṃ phalaṃ.
Ñāṇaṃ mama mahāvīra, uppannaṃ tava santike.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Svāgataṃ vata me āsi…pe… kataṃ buddhassa sāsanaṃ.
body.paragraph: Itthaṃ sudaṃ uppaladāyikā bhikkhunī bhagavato sammukhā imā gāthāyo abhāsitthāti.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Buddhe pasannā dhamme ca, saṅghe ca tibbagāravā;
body.gathalast: Taṃ ṭhānaṃ patthayitvāna, tisso sikkhā apūrayiṃ.
Adaliddoti taṃ āhu, amoghaṃ tassa jīvitaṃ.
Anuyuñjetha medhāvī, saraṃ buddhānabuddhānusāsanaṃbuddhānaṃ sāsanaṃ sāsanaṃ’.
Gotamo nāma gottena, satthā loke bhavissati.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Taṃ sutvā muditā hutvā, yāvajīvaṃ tadā jinaṃ;
body.gathalast: Taṃ disvā ovadī buddho, magge ṭhatvā vināyako.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Jino tasmiṃ guṇe tuṭṭho, etadagge ṭhapesi maṃ;
body.gathalast: Ñāṇaṃ mama mahāvīra, uppannaṃ tava santike.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Svāgataṃ vata me āsi…pe… kataṃ buddhassa sāsanaṃ.
body.paragraph: Itthaṃ sudaṃ siṅgālamātā bhikkhunī imā gāthāyo abhāsitthāti.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Tadā dhammakathaṃ katvā, hitāya janataṃ bahuṃjanatāya hitaṃ bahuṃ… sadāhitāya janasaṃsariṃ ;
‘‘Ekatiṃse ito kappe, sikhī viya sikhī jino;
body.gathalast: Tapanto yasasā lokelokaṃlokaṃ , uppajji vadataṃ varo.
Tato cutāhaṃ tidivaṃ, agaṃ sabhavanaṃ yathā.
Uppajji lokasaraṇo, araṇo amataṅgato vadataṃ varo, sabbasattānamuttamo (syā.).
Buddhe cittaṃ pasādetvā, pūjayiṃ taṃ yathābalaṃ.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Kiṃ me katā rājagahe manussā, madhuṃ pītāva acchare;
body.gathalast: Ye sukkaṃ na upāsanti, desentiṃ amataṃ padaṃ.
Ñāṇaṃ mama mahāvīra, uppannaṃ tava santike.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Svāgataṃ vata me āsi…pe… kataṃ buddhassa sāsanaṃ.
body.paragraph: Itthaṃ sudaṃ sukkā bhikkhunī imā gāthāyo abhāsitthāti.
body.gathalast: Jātā surūpā dayitā, pūjanīyā janassa ca.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Tadā dasahi ṭhānehi, adhibhotvāna sesake adhibhotvā asesato (syā.);
‘‘Abhirūpasampadampi abhirupaṃ upapadaṃ (sī.), abhirupaṃ uppādaṃ (pī.), ahu me kantisūcakaṃ;
‘‘Tadātadā mamatthaṃidha mamatteidha mamatte matthe sakyānaṃ, vivādo sumahā ahu;
body.gathalast: Pabbājesi tato tāto, mā sakyā vinassiṃsuti.
Aṭṭhāsiṃ bhavanibbindā, tadā maṃ āha nāyako.
Yathā idaṃ tathā etaṃ, yathā etaṃ tathā idaṃ.
Ñāṇaṃ mama mahāvīra, uppannaṃ tava santike.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Svāgataṃ vata me āsi…pe… kataṃ buddhassa sāsanaṃ.
body.paragraph: Itthaṃ sudaṃ abhirūpanandā bhikkhunī imā gāthāyo abhāsitthāti.
body.gathalast: Kassapo nāma gottena, uppajji vadataṃ varo.
Magge dhutte ṭhite sutvā, labhiṃ dūtopasampadaṃ.
Ñāṇaṃ mama mahāvīra, uppannaṃ tava santike.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Svāgataṃ vata me āsi…pe… kataṃ buddhassa sāsanaṃ.
body.paragraph: Itthaṃ sudaṃ aḍḍhakāsi bhikkhunī imā gāthāyo abhāsitthāti.
body.gatha1: ‘‘‘Yo ce vuḍḍho daharo vā, pāpakammaṃ pakubbati;
body.gathalast: Dakābhisiñcanā sopi bhoti (sī. ka.) therīgā. 239, pāpakammā pamuccati’.
Tañca sutvā sa saṃviggosusaṃviggo , pabbajitvārahā ahu.
Tato puṇṇāti nāmaṃ me, bhujissaṃ maṃ akaṃsu te.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Seṭṭhiṃ tatonujānetvātato anumodetvātato anumodetvātato anumānetvā , pabbajiṃ anagāriyaṃ;
body.gathalast: Ñāṇaṃ me vimalaṃ suddhaṃ, buddhaseṭṭhassa vāhasā.
Mānena nīcakulajā, na hi kammaṃ vinassatipanassati .
body.gatha1: ‘‘Svāgataṃ vata me āsi…pe… kataṃ buddhassa sāsanaṃ.
body.paragraph: Itthaṃ sudaṃ puṇṇikā bhikkhunī imā gāthāyo abhāsitthāti.
body.gathalast: Tassāhaṃ bhaginī āsiṃ, ajāyiṃ khattiye kule.
Tamhā pāpā na muccissaṃ, bhutvā duṭṭhavisaṃ yathā.
Pattāhaṃ acalaṃ ṭhānaṃ, dhītā buddhassa orasā.
Ñāṇaṃ me vimalaṃ suddhaṃ, buddhaseṭṭhassa vāhasā.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Svāgataṃ vata me āsi…pe… kataṃ buddhassa sāsanaṃ.
body.centered: Itthaṃ sudaṃ ambapāli bhikkhunī imā gāthāyo
body.gathalast: Kassapo nāma gottena, uppajji vadataṃ varo.
Pasūtā taṃnaṃ jinavaraṃ, disvā sutvā ca desanaṃ.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Taṃ vīraṃ saraṇaṃ gantvā, sīlāni ca samādiyiṃ;
‘‘Cakkhu ñāṇañca paññā ca, vijjāloko ca āsi me;
body.gathalast: Ñāṇaṃ me vimalaṃ suddhaṃ, buddhaseṭṭhassa vāhasā.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Svāgataṃ vata me āsi, mama buddhassa santike;
body.gathalast: Tisso vijjā anuppattā, kataṃ buddhassa sāsanaṃ.
body.paragraph: Itthaṃ sudaṃ pesalā selā (syā. pī.) bhikkhunī imā gāthāyo abhāsitthāti.
body.gatha1: Puṇṇā ca ambapālī ca, pesalāti ca tā dasa;
